55  enum class Level {Error = 1, Warning = 2, Information = 4};
56 
58  enum class Category {World, Body, Joint, ProxyShape};
59 
61  enum class Format {Text, HTML};
62 
64  static std::string getCategoryName(Category category) {
65 
66  switch(category) {
67  case Category::World: return "World";
68  case Category::Body: return "Body";
69  case Category::Joint: return "Joint";
70  case Category::ProxyShape: return "ProxyShape";
71  }
72 
73  assert(false);
74  return "";
75  }
76 
78  static std::string getLevelName(Level level) {
79 
80  switch(level) {
81  case Level::Information: return "Information";
82  case Level::Warning: return "Warning";
83  case Level::Error: return "Error";
84  }
85 
86  assert(false);
87  return "";
88  }

119  class TextFormatter : public Formatter {
120 
121  public:
122 
124  TextFormatter() {
125 
126  }
127 
129  virtual ~TextFormatter() override {
130 
131  }
132 
134  virtual std::string getHeader() const override {
135 
136  // Get current date
137  auto now = std::chrono::system_clock::now();
138  auto time = std::chrono::system_clock::to_time_t(now);
139 
140  std::stringstream ss;
141  ss << "ReactPhysics3D Logs" << std::endl;
142  ss << "ReactPhysics3D Version: " << RP3D_VERSION << std::endl;
143  ss << "Date: " << std::put_time(std::localtime(&time), "%Y-%m-%d") << std::endl;
144  ss << "---------------------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
145 
146  return ss.str();
147  }
148 
150  virtual std::string format(const time_t& time, const std::string& message,
151  Level level, Category category) override {
152  std::stringstream ss;
153 
154  // Time
155  ss << std::put_time(std::localtime(&time), "%X") << " ";
156 
157  // Level
158  ss << getLevelName(level) << " ";
159 
160  // Category
161  ss << getCategoryName(category) << " ";
162 
163  // Message
164  ss << message << std::endl;
165 
166  return ss.str();
167  }
168  };

268  std::string toLowerCase(const std::string& text) {
269  std::string textLower = text;
270  std::transform(textLower.begin(), textLower.end(), textLower.begin(), ::tolower);
271  return textLower;
272  }

287  virtual std::string format(const time_t& time, const std::string& message,
288  Level level, Category category) override {
289 
290  std::stringstream ss;
291 
292  ss << "<div class='line " + toLowerCase(getCategoryName(category)) + " " + toLowerCase(getLevelName(level)) + "'>";
293 
294  // Time
295  ss << "<div class='time'>";
296  ss << std::put_time(std::localtime(&time), "%X");
297  ss << "</div>";
298 
299  // Level
300  ss << "<div class='level'>";
301  ss << getLevelName(level);
302  ss << "</div>";
303 
304  // Category
305  ss << "<div class='category'>";
306  ss << getCategoryName(category);
307  ss << "</div>";
308 
309  // Message
310  ss << "<div class='message " << toLowerCase(getCategoryName(category)) <<
311  " " + toLowerCase(getLevelName(level)) << "'>" << std::endl;
312  ss << message;
313  ss << "</div>";
314 
315  ss << "</div>";
316 
317  return ss.str();
318  }

348  class FileDestination : public Destination {
349 
350  private:
351 
352  std::string mFilePath;
353 
355  std::ofstream mFileStream;
356 
357  public:
358 
360  FileDestination(const std::string& filePath, uint levelFlag, Formatter* formatter)
361  :Destination(levelFlag, formatter), mFilePath(filePath),
362  mFileStream(filePath, std::ios::binary) {
363 
364  if(!mFileStream.is_open()) {
365  throw(std::runtime_error("ReactPhysics3D Logger: Unable to open an output stream to file " + mFilePath));
366  }
367 
368  // Writer the head
369  mFileStream << formatter->getHeader() << std::endl;
370  }
371 
373  virtual ~FileDestination() override {
374 
375  // Writer the tail
376  mFileStream << formatter->getTail() << std::endl;
377 
378  if (mFileStream.is_open()) {
379 
380  // Close the stream
381  mFileStream.close();
382  }
383  }
384 
386  virtual void write(const time_t& time, const std::string& message, Level level, Category category) override {
387  mFileStream << formatter->format(time, message, level, category) << std::endl << std::flush;
388  }
389  };
